translation.en: [Optimus] We were once a peaceful race
of intelligent, mechanical beings.
But then came the war
between the Autobots, who fought for freedom,
and the Decepticons, who dreamt of tyranny.
Overmatched and outnumbered,
our defeat was all but certain.
But in the war's final days,
one Autobot ship escaped the battle.
It was carrying a secret cargo,
which would have changed our planet's fate.

translation.en: Consider it done.
Hey, you've got to guard him, 'cause he's the key to the whole thing.
Indeed, I am. What you must realize, my Autobot brothers,
is we were never going to win the war.
For the sake of our planet's survival, a deal had to be made

translation.en: with Megatron.
-Get back! -What have you done?
I hereby discharge you from duty.
-Bee! -Get back!
Rally all NEST forces back to the base! Come on!
translation.ko: NEST 대원 전원 본부로 소집해! - 가자! - 안 돼요!

translation.en: -No... -Come on.
Get a medic down here!
We don't have enough men! Do not engage Sentinel!
[Mearing] Just go to the back gate.
Take cover!
Watch left! Watch left!
[Mearing] Let's go! Follow me!
-Director, don't go there! -Stand down!
Hey, Sentinel!
-Director! -[Mearing] What is going on?
translation.ko: - 센티넬! - 국장님! 무슨 짓인가? 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: What do you think you are doing?
I am a Prime!
I do not take orders from you.
Director Mearing, come on. We can't fight him. Let's go. We have to go.
translation.ko: 미어링 국장님 우리가 맞설 수 없습니다

translation.en: Now, return what belongs to me!
Oh, my God!
-[soldier 1] You guys okay? -[soldier 2] Is everybody out?
Everybody, stay calm. You're gonna be fine.
Yeah, take a look, Optimus! This is all on you!
Sentinel hit the vault. Took the pillars.
Come on, let's go. All right, notify the 101st Airborne!
We need to hunt this thing down!
Carly!
[Ron] Hot from our little campfire. -S'mores. Isn't that great? -Aww.
We're really living off the land.
[Sam] Mom, Dad, have you guys seen Carly come home yet?
Excuse me. Can you knock, please? This is our bedroom.
-Why wouldn't she be at home? -We had a fight, and we might have broken up,
translation.ko: 칼리는 왜? 싸웠는데 헤어진 건지 뭔지 모르겠어요

translation.en: or be on a break. I don't really know.
-What? No. -Look, I can't talk about it right now.
translation.ko: 뭐? - 그럼 안 되지! - 칼리부터 찾고 얘기하죠

translation.en: -I can't go into details, Mom. I have to find her. -You gotta be kidding me.
translation.ko: - 그럼 안 되지! - 칼리부터 찾고 얘기하죠

translation.en: Sit down. We're having a family meeting. Family meeting!
You may not know this, but your father and I were not always this perfectly happy.
translation.ko: 네 아빠랑 나도 늘 행복했던 건 아냐

translation.en: You know, there was a time in our marriage when I thought this was not gonna work out.
translation.ko: 엄마도 이건 아니다 싶은 때가 있었어

translation.en: -Can we please not? -She's damaging him.
You break up with one world-class hottie--
No. Stop. Stop, okay? She dumped me, I moved on to something better. That's it. I'm a happier person.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 걔가 날 찼어요 결과적으로 잘됐어요

translation.en: -The second beautiful girl, you lose her. -Why don't you help me?
-They had an argument. -[Sam] One fight.
[Judy] You're not gonna get a third one. I mean, unless you have like a big...
translation.ko: 이게 마지막 기회야 네 거시기가 크면 모를까

translation.en: What the... Ma!
Maybe you just don't know what you're doing.
-I don't want to talk about this anymore. -You need the book.
translation.ko: - 테크닉이 부족하니? - 듣기 싫어요 책을 주마

translation.en: -Tell him about the book. -You're always wrong. Get used to it.
Okay. You've gotta read this. She Comes First.
-There's some killer shit in here. -No. No.
-That's it, I'm going. -No! No!
Sit down, sit down! Back me up!
-Happy wife, happy life. -Heck yeah.
Unhappy wife, stone-cold misery for the rest of your--
-Stop. -It's true.
All I'm saying is, do you love this girl?
She's the one. Then you gotta go get her.
I mean, your dad and I, when we had troubles, he moved heaven and earth to find me.
translation.ko: 네 아빠는 나랑 다퉈도 지구 끝까지 쫓아왔어

translation.en: Say what you said. Say it.
[Ron] "I will follow you to the end of time."
Does that suck or what?
-It's like a bad sci-fi film. -No. It is so sweet.
translation.ko: - 삼류 공상과학 영화 대사 같지? - 사랑스러웠어

translation.en: I want you to get out of the city. You get as far away from here as you can.
You understand? I love you.
Ah, my master! Such a brilliant scheme!
So when Sentinel left Cybertron, it was to defect?
He was meant to rendezvous with me here on Earth
before fate waylaid us both.
The only way to revive him,
we needed Prime and his Matrix.
[Starscream] Excellent strategy.
Mine, mine!
So he is now your partner, master?
He is my greatest triumph.
So impressive.
Commencing transport.
Stop! No! No, Sentinel!
Forgive me.
Here we are.
Fight us now.
Autobots, retreat!
Why, Sentinel, why?
For Cybertron! For our home!
What war destroyed, we can rebuild! But only if we join with the Decepticons.
translation.ko: 전쟁 피해를 복구하려면 디셉티콘의 도움이 필요했다

translation.en: No, it's not the only way. This is our home. We must defend the humans.
translation.ko: 이제 이곳이 고향입니다 인간을 지켜야 한다고요

translation.en: So lost you are, Optimus.
On Cybertron, we were gods.
And here, they call us machines.
Let the humans serve us, or perish.
translation.ko: 우릴 받들지 않으면 인류는 멸망할 것이다

translation.en: You're lucky I didn't kill you. In time you'll see.
translation.ko: 살려준 걸 고맙게 생각해라 너도 곧 깨달을 거다

translation.en: It's not over.
[Dylan] Now, if I were him, I wouldn't let you out of my sight for one second.
translation.ko: 내가 샘이라면 당신을 혼자 두지 않을 텐데

translation.en: It's funny. I was just thinking on the way over here, I could really use some advice from Dylan, and there he is.
translation.ko: 충고 참 고맙네요 칼리, 얘기 좀 하자

translation.en: -Can I speak to you, Carly? -Welcome. Please, sit down. Have a drink.
You know what, I don't need a drink. Or a car, or a job.
I just need to speak to my girlfriend alone. Is that okay with you, Mr. Inappropriate?
translation.ko: 애인과 얘기 좀 할게요 괜찮죠, 부적절 씨?

translation.en: Excuse me.
-[Carly] What's going on? -[Sam] I'll tell you outside.
I really think I can help you, Sam. I remember a talk I had with my dad once about tough choices.
Yeah, now's not the time. We'll set something up, though.
Of course, it was way back, when my dad's firm was in charge
of budget review and accounting for NASA.
You see, the thing that he taught me was,
when it's not your war, you join the side that's going to win.
translation.ko: 그때 말씀하시길 나와 무관한 전쟁에서는 승자의 편에 서라셨죠

translation.en: -Move. -Too direct? Or is it just me?
Certainly not you, sir.
-[Carly screams] -[Soundwave] You're mine!
No!
-Get help! -Sam, I can't get out!
-[Sam] Someone get help! -Good night! Good night, Mr. Dylan.
[Carly] Get me out of here!
[Sam] Help! Get help!
-He's young. He will learn. Good night. -Get me out!
translation.ko: - 녀석도 철 들면 깨닫겠죠 - 꺼내줘! - 안녕히 가세요 - 즐거웠습니다

translation.en: It was a fun night.
You really think you're the first man ever asked to join the noble alien cause?
translation.ko: 외계인과 협력하는 사람이 자네밖에 없는 줄 아나?

translation.en: Who are you?
Do you know why we've not been back to the moon since 1972?
translation.ko: 1972년 이후로 우리가 달에 안 간 이유를 아나?

translation.en: Because these two, they came to my dad and they told him to do some creative accounting.
translation.ko: 저 둘이 우리 아버지에게 회계 조작을 요청했거든

translation.en: Make it way too expensive to ever go back. So, he and the others
shut down the American and Russian space programs.
And they've been our clients ever since.
You helped them kill people? You think they'd give you a choice?
Besides, it's not like I personally participated. I am a liaison. I liaise.
translation.ko: 내가 직접 나선 것도 아냐 난 연락 담당자일 뿐이지

translation.en: It's hostile takeover time, Sam.
Sam!
Sam!
-Let her go! -Sam!
Sam!
[Dylan] I've had my eye on you for years, Sam.
You're the one spy I've never been able to provide as someone close to the Autobots.
Sam! Don't do what he wants!
Yes, he will.
They all do.
They will slaughter her, you understand me?
In the time it takes you to blink, they'll do it to her, and they'll do it to me.
translation.ko: 눈 깜짝할 새에 칼리와 날 죽일 거라고

translation.en: So you show a little respect when someone offers you a job!
translation.ko: 누군가 일자리를 줄 땐 감사히 좀 받아들여!

translation.en: Wrist.
You are to track down Optimus Prime,
because you're the one human he trusts, and you will ask one question.
translation.ko: 너를 믿는 그에게 한 가지만 물어

translation.en: How does he intend to fight back? Strategies, tactics, everything!
translation.ko: 어떻게 반격할 건지 전략, 전술, 다 캐내!

translation.en: Has a nasty little bite, doesn't it? It's very high-tech.
It lets us see what you see, hear what you hear, and it taps your nervous system.
translation.ko: 자네가 보고 듣는 걸 전하고 신경계에도 접근할 수 있지

translation.en: So, if you so much as try and signal...
I don't know what to tell you, Sam. Relationships have consequences.
translation.ko: 이걸 뭐라고 해야 하나 인간관계가 원인이야

translation.en: I am here because of my father. She is here because of you.
translation.ko: 나는 아버지 때문에 칼리는 자네 때문에 여기 있지

translation.en: Stop, stop! Stop! Stop!
Soundwave, would you please?
Sam, do your job.
She'll be safe. I give you my word.
I'll kill you. You have my word.
[Morshower] Combatant Commands are now at DEFCON 1.
Approximately 200 Decepticons are now in hiding.
Energon detectors have been triggered as far away as South America and China.
The U.N. just received an encrypted audio file. They say it's from the leader of the Autobots.
translation.ko: 오토봇 지도자가 UN에 음성 파일을 보냈습니다

translation.en: [Sentinel] Defenders of Earth,

translation.ko: 우린 지구의 자원으로 우리 행성을 재건할 것이다

translation.en: When we have transported all we need, we will leave your world in peace.
translation.ko: 필요한 자원을 획득한 후 조용히 떠나겠다

translation.en: For such peace to exist,
you must immediately exile the Autobot rebels you have harbored.
Non-negotiable.
Renounce the rebels.
We await your reply.
[Mearing] We'll debrief you in transit.
Yeah, I really don't see how I can be of any help. I mean, you guys seem pretty busy.
translation.ko: 전 별 도움이 안 될 테고 바빠 보이시는데

translation.en: We could just do this another time, I think.
I have underestimated you at every turn.
What?
You warned us that they were using humans. And you knew that Sentinel was the key.
translation.ko: 인간을 이용하는 거라 경고했고 센티넬이 핵심임을 알고 있었지

translation.en: [man] Director!
Who am I? Hey, you're the expert. I'm just a walking security risk.
translation.ko: 국장님이 잘 아시겠죠 전 걸어 다니는 안보 위협이에요

translation.en: Are you all right?
-Yes. -No, you're not. You're sweating.
I'm fine. I'm fine. I'm sweating because I'm nervous.
I'm nervous because you got me in here with this information. Okay, I'm a Twitter junkie. I blog everything.
translation.ko: 여긴 기밀이 널렸는데 제가 트위터 중독자거든요

translation.en: -I can't keep a secret to save my life. -You wouldn't dare.
translation.ko: - 제게 비밀이란 없죠 - 꿈도 꾸지 마

translation.en: Director, the Pentagon's calling in 15.
-What are you doing? -Nothing. What are you doing?
Get away from me.
It's been a remarkable series of events today at the Capitol.
translation.ko: 오늘 하루 국회 의사당은 잠잠할 틈이 없었습니다

translation.en: Just moments ago, legislation was passed
translation.ko: 오늘 하루 국회 의사당은 잠잠할 틈이 없었습니다 오토봇을 미국에서 추방하는 법안이 막 통과되었습니다

translation.en: to exile the Autobots from American shores.
translation.ko: 오토봇을 미국에서 추방하는 법안이 막 통과되었습니다

translation.en: The U.S. military alliance with them -is officially over. -[phone vibrating]
In the words of the House Majority Leader, the sponsor of today's resolution,
translation.ko: - 하원 원내대표의 말을 빌리자면 - 얘기해, 알겠어

translation.en: -"We cannot in good conscience..." -[Mearing] Okay.
What? They can't do this.
translation.ko: - 이것은 양심의 문제로… - 뭐? 안 된다고 전하세요

translation.en: You gotta tell them. They can't do that.
Okay. It's official. It's a go, people.
These are our allies. The Autobots fought for us. They fought with us.
And where are we now? Facing an enemy invasion with an enemy that has the means to deploy countless more.
translation.ko: 그래서 어떻게 됐지? 엄청난 병력을 가진 적이 침략했어

translation.en: If there is any more you know,
anything at all about the enemy's intentions...
now is the time to tell.
Autobots have no way of leaving this planet.
And that is where you're wrong.
Its name is the Xanthium.
It brought the second wave of Autobots,
and it's been under NASA's care and study ever since.
We linked it with a decommissioned shuttle to maintain military control until they're gone.
translation.ko: 퇴역 우주 왕복선과 엮어서 군사 관리하에 뒀지

translation.en: Gonna be 10,000 pounds of torque

translation.ko: 저건 토크가 14,000뉴턴미터는 된다니까! - 25,000뉴턴미터는 안 돼 - 그러다 우리 다 죽겠어!

translation.en: You're gonna risk the lives of all me mates! I'll ball you!
translation.ko: - 25,000뉴턴미터는 안 돼 - 그러다 우리 다 죽겠어!

translation.en: These guys are the Wreckers. They take care of the Xanthium.
We don't let them off the base much, 'cause they're assholes.
translation.ko: 워낙 통제 불가라 기지에서 잘 안 내보내지

translation.en: You gotta pull that, ya nancy wanker! It's time to kill him!
I'm just trying to help, you know. Just doing my job.
[Epps] Just calm down. Leave him alone. This is a human being.
-Epps! -[Roadbuster] You are ridiculous!
-[Sam] Is that you? -What up, man? -What are you doing here? -[electronic whirring]
I retired from the Air Force.
Can you let my hand go?
What the hell was that?
Now I just consult to run interference for them.
[Roadbuster] Well, you're not helping!
No more combat and aliens shooting at my ass. I got a dream job.
translation.ko: 외계인 전투랑 작별했지 이게 내 꿈의 직장이야

translation.en: [Roadbuster] Time to get off this planet.
Kicking the Autobots out. Can you believe this is happening?
Where do you think it's taking them? Any planet but here.
translation.ko: - 어디로 갈까? - 지구가 아닌 어딘가로 가겠지

translation.en: I wanna talk to whoever's in charge here.
Well, well, well. Charlotte Mearing.
Agent Simmons. Former Agent Simmons. So, I see you survived Washington.
Washington, Egypt, heartbreak. I survive. I will survive.
translation.ko: 워싱턴, 이집트, 실연 난 모든 걸 극복해 내

translation.en: They're bringing everybody in, kid. Putting all the intel on the table.
And if you think deporting nine Autobots is gonna solve a damn thing--
translation.ko: 오토봇 9대를 추방한다고 해결될 줄 아나 본데

translation.en: It's out of my hands.
Moving up in the world, huh?
Your booty looks excellent.
If you ever say a word to anyone about what happened that night in Quantico,
translation.ko: 콴티코 기지에서의 일을 입 밖에 냈다간

translation.en: I'll cut your heart out.
You already did.
[Wheelie] Sammy, listen to me. Don't let them exile us.
translation.ko: 샘, 잘 들어 우릴 추방하지 못하게 해

translation.en: Don't let them take us, Sam. It's a Decepticon trap.
[Leadfoot] Check the nitrogen levels. We're booking out of here.
Optimus?
What your leaders say is true. This was all my fault.
translation.ko: 네 지도자들이 옳다 이건 내 탓이야

translation.en: I told them whom to trust. I was so wrong.
That doesn't make it your fault. It just makes you human for a change.
translation.ko: 네 잘못은 없어 그냥 인간적인 실수지

translation.en: Remember this.
You may lose your faith in us,
but never in yourselves.
I need to know how you're gonna fight back.
I know this is strategy, I know you're coming back
translation.ko: 전략이 있다는 거 알아 지원군 데리고 올 거지?

translation.en: with reinforcements, something. I know there's a plan.
translation.ko: 전략이 있다는 거 알아 지원군 데리고 올 거지? 계획을 말해줘

translation.en: You can tell me. No other human will ever know.
There is no plan.
If we just do what they want, how are we gonna live with ourselves?
translation.ko: 놈들이 시키는 대로 하면 그 죄책감을 어쩌라고?

translation.en: You are my friend, Sam.
You always will be.
But your leaders have spoken.
From here...
the fight will be your own.
[Optimus] Make it short.
We're loading up.
[Leadfoot] All right, hustle up! We're launching at dawn.
We're gonna do whatever we can. Make it like it was.
You will always be my friend, Sam.
I gotta be going on.
Years from now, they're gonna ask us,
"Where were you when they took over the planet?"
translation.ko: 지구가 침략당할 때 뭘 했느냐고 말이야

translation.en: We're gonna say,
"We just stood by and watched."
[Dylan] You should really look at this as a partnership.
You have to stand on the side of progress if you wanna be a part of history.
translation.ko: 역사의 일부가 되려면 진보의 편에 서야 해

translation.en: [launch announcer] Seven, six, five,
four, three, two, one, zero.
Go ahead and throttle up.
First flight.
translation.ko: 추진력을 높여 부스터로 비행하라 - 비행 - 알았다

translation.en: You wanted an answer. You got one.
I always get what I want, Sam. We just needed to be sure.
translation.ko: - 당신 뜻대로 됐어 - 당연한 일이지 하지만 확인해야겠어

translation.en: -Sure of what? -That they would go without a fight.
-[man] Say again. -[woman] We're tracking an incoming object.
We all work for the Decepticons now.
I need your help to track a phone call. There's a man on this phone. He's the head of their human operations, and he has Carly hostage.
translation.ko: 방금 통화한 사람이 칼리를 납치했으니 추적해 줘요

translation.en: I want you to sit down. Don't move.
Follow me.
I'm watching him drive up right now.
[Dutch] The call was placed en route. I'm hacking into the phone's camera now.
translation.ko: 이동 중에 전화했습니다 카메라를 해킹해 보죠

translation.en: There, that's it. That's a live stream from the camera.
Someplace... Hold on. I can triangulate this.
Okay, it's Chicago cell sites. There, I've got it.
Trump Tower, Chicago. Lower penthouse.
We're on.
-I'm going. -[Simmons] You sure?
She's done nothing but try to help me, and I can be there in 15 hours.
[Epps] You're not going alone.
I still got my NEST friends out there.
I'll round them up, we'll find your girlfriend, we're gonna bring this guy in.
Why are you helping me?
'Cause that asshole killed my friends, too.
They said they were here for our resources, to rebuild their planet.
Yes, but really one resource in particular.
One unique to our planet.
Us?
You're very smart. You see, they can't rebuild without a slave labor force.
How many rocks up there in the universe offer six billion workers?
What are you talking about? We can't transport people.
They're not shipping people. They're shipping their planet here.
[Carly] Oh, my God.
What's Sentinel doing here?
[Dylan] Watch. They're spreading hundreds of pillars around the globe right now.
translation.ko: 잘 봐 전 세계에 기둥을 세우는 거야

translation.en: In just a few hours, they're gonna launch them into orbit and bring Cybertron into our atmosphere.
translation.ko: 몇 시간 후에 사이버트론을 우리 대기권으로 가져올 거야

translation.en: The red one there controls the rest. He triggers that, it starts the whole thing.
translation.ko: 빨간 기둥이 나머지를 제어해 저걸 가동하면 이동이 시작돼

translation.en: Be gone, insect operative. Your work is done.
translation.ko: 벌레 같은 정보원 네 임무는 끝났다

translation.en: Your Excellency. He's such a dick.
You want this to happen? I want to survive. I want 40 more years.
translation.ko: - 이 상황이 좋아요? - 난 40년은 더 살고 싶어

Your Decepticons finally conquering this planet, and yet, their leader won't be you!

translation.en: It will be me! It will always be me.
In any minute now,
you'll be nothing but Sentinel's bitch.
translation.ko: 조금만 있으면 넌 센티넬의 졸개가 돼

translation.en: [Hooch] Rocket!
Die!
You chose sides?
You chose wrong.
[Sentinel] Always the bravest of us!
But you could never make the hard decisions!
Our planet will survive.
No!
We were gods once. All of us.
-But here... -Please!
...there will only be one!
[Megatron] This is my planet!
I just saved a whole other world.
You think you're a hero, huh? You think you're a hero?
No. I'm just a messenger.
The pillar's still connected!
[Epps] Bring it up!
-Bee! Let's do this! -[Lennox] Let's go, let's go! Move, move!
translation.ko: - 비! - 가자! - 작전 개시! - 기둥이 작동 중이다

translation.en: Pillar's still connected!
[Roadbuster] Rip that pillar down!
Now, we need a truce.
All I want is to be back in charge.
Besides,
who would you be without me, Prime?
Time to find out.
Optimus, all I ever wanted
was the survival of our race.
You must see why I had to betray you.
You didn't betray me.
You betrayed yourself.
No, Optimus!
Sam.
I love you.
I love you.
You're the only thing I need in this world, and I'll do anything to make it up to you, I promise.
translation.ko: 난 너만 있으면 돼 이번 일을 어떻게든 만회할게

translation.en: I'm going to hold you to that. Just never let me go.
translation.ko: 그 약속 꼭 지켜 날 절대 놓치지 마

translation.en: I promise.
[Carly] Ooh. Rings.
I love this car.
-Bee, you've got to slow it down. -[laughing] You got to slow way down, okay?
I'm just trying to help out.
[Optimus] In any war,
there are calms between storms.
You fought bravely.
There will be days when we lose faith.
Days when our allies turn against us.
But the day will never come that we forsake this planet
and its people.
That's what I call the start of a beautiful future.
-Arrest him. -[laughs]
-It was worth it! -Get him out of here!
I'd go to jail for love! I don't care!
Go ahead, take me in! I want to go in! Let's go in.
Come on, Charlotte, take me in right now!
